column2: As the Design, youre a high-performing leader for the studio, working closely with our other leaders  to guide teams and ensure that our work is true to AKQA?? mission and values: thoughtful, innovative, high quality, and in service of our clients and their customers. column2: We're Nagarro. We are a Digital Product Engineering company that is scaling in a big way! We build products, services, and experiences that inspire, excite, and delight. We work at scale  across all devices and digital mediums, and our people exist everywhere in the world (18000+ experts across 36 countries, to be exact). Our work culture is dynamic and non-hierarchical. We are looking for great new colleagues. That's where you come in! REQUIREMENTS: Collaborate with diverse, talented individuals, including designers, researchers, product managers, content owners, and developers, to bring cutting-edge digital products and experiences to life. Skilfully translate research insights into actionable ideas, prioritizing features that drive business results and customer satisfaction. Embrace a user-centered approach, utilizing design thinking methods to uncover user needs and create engaging solutions that make a real impact. Contribute to all phases of work: from vision to defining requirements, building personas, site maps, workflows, and customer journeys ??to wireframing, prototyping, validation, and implementation. Design immersive and intuitive interfaces across various platforms and devices, from mobile and web to wearables, AR/VR, and more.  Advocate for exceptional design and contribute to shaping a culture of design at Nagarro RESPONSIBILITIES: You have 5+ years of experience and a solid online portfolio You are an excellent communicator and can clearly articulate strategic design decisions to stakeholders You can hit the ground running and work in a fast-paced environment You are an expert in Figma and Adobe Creative Suite and can collaborate seamlessly with engineers You have the discipline to work remotely and drive initiatives forward without being in a physical office. You can travel occasionally to participate in onsite workshops
